column4: [HELP] hey all :) I'm triple booting xp,win7 and ubuntu. for ubuntu i have 18Gb(ext3) and 1.6Gb(swap). [PROBLEM=] It freezes
when does it freeze?
just now i had firefox on
it freezes when you start firefox?
also downloading an app from ubuntu software centre and pidgin
I was just away for 5 min

ok. i also have a external 1Tb seagate external

yup
and it seems to hang when you go on the internet in general?
but your irc'ing at the moment...
i'm not sure. ya
what kind of connection do you have?

broadband
ya

then installed 1. xp, 2.  win 7 and then 3. ubuntu
